# Hello! My name is Perry Giambuzzi and I am a second year Ecoinformatics PhD
# student in Andrew Richardson's lab. I am interested in using phenology data 
# from PhenoCam, NEON, and MODIS to determine the relative influence of drivers
# of autumn phenology across deciduous broadleaf forests.
